item.title: Setting hugo to work with local files
item.description: This is not really an issue, as one can easily just do hugo server -D insead of working with local files, but for the sake of registering this information here it is: baseURL = "" relativeurls = true uglyurls = true uglyurls=true makes content entries be generated as posts/title.html instead of posts/title/[index.html] Source
